project_abstract.cdata: The project consists of: (a) a rockfill dam on the Shire River at Nkula site; (b) a pressure cut and cover conduit, head racetunnel, penstock and tailrace outlet system and a power house for five 18-MW hydro units; (c) two 18-MW hydro units as the first stage of the 90-MW ultimate development; (d) consulting services; and (e) training.
